title: 關於wh的問題
content:
Classified ads and yellow page telephone directions would suffer if advertising were only about telling people ___already want something to get it....
A)whom
B)whoever
C)who 
D)whose 
答案是c
原本想說是不是缺首詞所以選A
有人知道為什麼嗎🥺
excerpt: Classified ads and yellow page telephone directions would suffer if advertising were only about tell
